TopicTitle: A M O N G T H E S T A R S - Production Update

Articles.Content:
Sorry guys,

Good and Bad news from the editing team.

Good news: we have improved the storyline and the graphics and the sound quality, so for those drama people out there, yay!

Now available in 4K in english only...

Bad news...

We had to postpone the release of the movie by about 28 days. We've hit an editing problem, and now we're fixing it.

R.I.P. old trailer.

Teaser release: Sat Aug 20

Final Teaser Release: Sat Aug 27

Production Release: (US & CAN) 09.01.16 - by yours truly and 1PIXL.

Production Release: (Worldwide, in other languages) 09.15.16 - translated by 1PIXL.

 

Oh yeah and everybody congratulate 1PIXL on him making M.I.T for his doctorate in computer science! 

Yeah that's a lot to brag about. Sorry. (wink wink nudge nudge)

Edited August 13, 2016 by Bluarc
